titles: The Charitable Samaritan, or, A short and impartial account of that eminent and publick-spirited citizen Mr. Tho. Firmin who departed this life on Monday Dec. 20, 1697 / by a gentleman of his acquaintance.
author: Gentleman of his acquaintance.
notes: "In a letter to a person of quality."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
